description:
Sister Ashleigh has spent her whole life keeping herself pure
and worthy for her future husband. She knows the Seed Bearer
will choose who she’s to marry, but it seems as though one of
his advisors has taken a liking to her. Trusting in him and the
leadership, she doesn’t think twice about going with Brother
Hart to his van after a late night church meeting. When the two
are alone, Brother Hart immediately began to seduce her,
tempting her with his handsome good looks and charming
smile…
title: Alone in a Minivan with Brother Hart
